info.title: Game Info
info.content:
Roulette game rules

Inside Bets

Bets are placed on:

  • Straight/ Single: Bet on a single number
  • Street: Bet on three consecutive numbers in a horizontal line (e.g. 7-8-9)
  • Six-Line/ Double Street: Bet on six consecutive numbers that form two horizontal lines (e.g. 31-32-33-34-35-36)
  • Trio: A three-number bet that involves at least one zero: 0-1-2, 0-2-3


Outside Bets

  • 1-18 (Low) or 19-36 (High): A bet that the number will be in the chosen range.
  • Red or Black: A bet that the number will be the chosen colour.
  • Even or Odd: A bet that the number will be of the chosen type.
  • Dozen bet: A bet that the number will be in the chosen dozen: first (1-12), second (13-24), or third(25-36).


You can make multiple bets and each bet can have its own win.Winning amount is calculated according to PAYTABLE.

Paytable

The winning amount for each bet is calculated by multiplying the bet amount with the corresponding multiplier according to Paytable.
The winning amount for the round is calculated as the sum of each winning bet.

Single Numbers (Straight) – 35 to 1
Any Dozen – 2 to 1
Any Column – 2 to 1
Low or High – 1 to 1
Even or Odd – 1 to 1
Red or Black – 1 to 1

Return to player

The theoretical max return to player in this game is 97.30%

modals.TEXT_GENERIC_ERROR_TEXT: It looks like something did not work, but there is no need for concern.Please, reload the game
modals.TEXT_INSUFFICIENT_FOUNDS_LABEL: Please reduce your bet to continue playing.
modals.TEXT_ZERO_FOUNDS_LABEL: Please deposit more money to continue playing.
modals.TEXT_INSURANCE_ERROR: Your chosen bets could NOT be accepted at this time due to an inability to secure insurance for jackpot win.
modals.TEXT_WEBSOCKET_CLOSED: Your session has timed out due to inactivity, please refresh by reloading the page.
